settings.title: have it all
settings.text: Fancy trying all six ripple<sup>+</sup> formulas? Of course you do. And with our sampler pack, you can.

settings.title: have it all
settings.text: Fancy trying all six ripple formulas? Of course you do. And with our sampler pack, you can.

settings.title: about
settings.collection_info: Our botanical blends and zero-nicotine formulas are a non-addictive and plant-powered alternative. Ripples come in six formulas: POWER, DREAM, BOOST, RELAX, REVIVE, FOCUS and are filled with functional ingredients and natural aromas.

settings.title: the device
settings.collection_info:
The ripple device is designed to heat each of our six original formulas to a specific temperature for optimum experience and control. The device heats the botanical blends turning them to vapour which can be inhaled by the body.

Ripples are all one size and are super simple to use, once you’ve removed the protective caps just inhale your chosen blend for three seconds and enjoy.

settings.title: formulations
settings.collection_info: Ripple comes in six formulas: Power, Relax, Boost, Dream, Revive + Focus. Each blend is a combination of functional plant extracts infused with natural aromas for the purest flavour. None of our formulas contain any nicotine and all our custom botanical blends are formulated in state-of-the-art labs in the U.K. They’re non-GMO, free of pesticides and natural.

settings.title: have it all
settings.text: Fancy trying all six ripple+ formulas? Of course you do. And with our sampler pack, you can.

settings.ho_info:
Discover ripple+ 2.0 and join the
biggest reward program to date.

settings.title: Paola V.
settings.info: "Ripple really change my life; it helps me feel calmer and I don't have to worry or feel bad because it's nicotine-free! And all the aromas are amazing, but my favorite so far is Power - I really love that minty cooling sensation".

settings.title: Eli W.
settings.info: "The packaging is SO high quality - each step of the unboxing experience wowed me with the sleek and sophisticated design. You cannot go wrong with this purchase. Very, very, very satisfied ripplenaut over here!"

settings.title: Nyx N.
settings.info: "15 minutes in and I'm loving the experience. The pods are super easy to switch out and I love that they're magnetic, and the feel of the device is really sleek!"

settings.title: Anna A.
settings.info: "Got this at the event (which was so lovely) and I have to say this beats all other pod devices I’ve had in the past. Everything from the unboxing experience to the feel of the product and amazing aromas is just the best of all worlds. Recommend 100 times!"

settings.title: Tiarna W.
settings.info: “This has helped me a bunch, especially when it comes to taking a break from my fast-paced lifestyle of mine and slowing down with some smooth plant-powered puffs of aromatherapy - so peaceful! Get yourself one right now!”

settings.title: Sarah K.
settings.info: “The new rechargeable diffuser is amazing! The flavours hit even harder than those of single diffusers and, of course, it's less wasteful. Great innovation!”

settings.title: Brandon K.
settings.info: "Really nice and smooth to use, you can clearly tell it's natural unlike those filthy chemicals found in other products. Ripple considered their customers and provided an amazing puffing experience!"
“In an age of busier-than-ever-lifestyles, ripple+ has gotten aromatherapy right. Their plant-powered aromatic diffusers have become an on-the-go wellness staple.”
“The brand’s nicotine-free, plant powered diffusers feature unique combinations of natural ingredients and are created with every mood in mind”
“ripple+ has revolutionised aromatherapy for good, with custom combinations of ingredients such as peppermint, tropical mango and jasmine.“

settings.text: The more you refer, the bigger the prizes. Recruit ripplenauts to sign up, and unlock five levels of POD era greatness:

settings.ho_info:
Infinitely yours to puff.
The Pod era is upon us

settings.title1: RIPPLED AND RATED BY THE FAM

lab-tested ingredients

settings.title: OUR ALL-NEW POD DEVICE
settings.text:
Experience the POD system in full, with the ultimate starter kit containing one infinitely rechargeable POD device, plus four* POD packs to get you going.

*POWER, RELAX, DREAM and BOOST. Device is also compatible with FOCUS and ZEST, sold seperately.

settings.col_title: THE POD WILL BE WITH YOU, ALWAYS

settings.first_info: Meet the POD system: one infinitely rechargeable device. Six signature nicotine-free formulas. The most advanced take on nicotine-free tech has landed.
Our single-use puffs are the perfect ripple+ taste testing experience: each device delivers 400 puffs so you can unlock a plant-powered utopia.
Meet our saving sets: custom combinations of fan-favourite formulas so you can ripple+ for less + unlock free shipping.
settings.title: RIPPLE EXPERIENCE
settings.text:
The total ripple+ experience: now available in
one easy bundle because hey, you’ve got better
things to be doing than adding items to cart.

Welcome to the F**k Nicotine club.

POD DEVICE
settings.text: Experience the POD system in full, with the ultimate starter kit containing one infinitely rechargeable POD device, plus four* POD packs to get you going. *POWER, RELAX, DREAM and BOOST. The ripple+ device is also compatible with FOCUS, ZEST and HAPPY sold separately.

settings.title: have it all
settings.text: Fancy trying all six ripple+ formulas? Of course you do. And with our sampler pack, you can!

settings.ho_info:
One infinitely rechargeable device. Six flagship flavours. Our cleanest inhalation experience yet. The POD system is a new innovation from ripple+ featuring advanced tech that takes nicotine-free puffs to the next level in sustainability and satisfaction.

With fast-charging USB-C capabilities and a seamless magnetic connection between device and flavour pack, this is the key to unlocking eternal
plant-powered utopia.
